ValidationRule.description: Checks to ensure key fields are populated where the status of the LOA is information received
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL( MainLOAStatus__c, "Information Received" )
&&
ISBLANK( DateFirstResponseProvider__c )
&&
ISPICKVAL( Format_of_information_received__c, "" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure the format of information received and date of the first response is complete
